Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Chemistry Enzymatic Hemoglobin A1c (A1c_E) Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens ADVIA Chemistry Enzymatic Hemoglobin A1c assay for quantitative determination of HbA1c in whole blood and hemolysate
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic assay for quantitative determination of HbA1c (mmol/mol and %) in human anticoagulated venous whole blood and hemolysate to aid in diagnosis and monitoring of long-term blood glucose control in diabetes mellitus, and identification of patients at risk for developing diabetes mellitus
